reporter_caption.center: STATE, GALBREATH v. DIST. COURT OF NINTH JUD. DIST., 116 Mont. 604 (1944)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. DEXTER GALBREATH, PETITIONER, v. DISTRICT COURT OF THE NINTH

opinion.posture: Ex parte application by S.J. Rigney, attorney for petitioner, for an alternative writ of prohibition requiring the respondent court to set aside its order of May 24, 1944 in the action entitled Dexter Galbreath v. Asa E. Armstrong, Sheriff of Glacier County, et al., granting a new trial conditionally.
opinion.opinion_text: The writ applied for is hereby denied.
